p: A 2020 study by Izzo and colleagues analyzed some phenolic compounds in Cannabis sativa L. inflorescences using ultra-high-performance liquid chromatography-quadruple-orbitrap high-resolution mass spectrometry (UHPLC-Q-Orbitrap HRMS). Table 4 below lists some of the phenolic compounds investigated. Cannabisin A, B and C were the predominant lignanamides identified [ 34].
